NewsArticle.Title: Nexon fixed Nigel Quest Reward
NewsArticle.Content: Completing all parts of the Nigel quest now correctly offers a special item from his open chest. You may need to wander around the chest to find the treasure. Nigel quest had offered a reward from his chest. However, until now, the chest was empty. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your detailed reports that helped identify the error.
